params.execute: true if this is actual execution

returns.issueBaseBounty: true if needs to issue base bounty

claimFromConverter(address).details: Rewards are transfered to converter. In the Prime Capital protocol 		the role of the Converter is taken over by Compounder.sol.

earnedBalances(address).details: Earned balances may be withdrawn immediately, but will incur a penalty between 25-90%, based on a linear schedule of elapsed time.

returns.earningsData: which is an array of all infos

params.claimRewards: true to claim rewards when exit

params.user: address of the user for which the balances are fetched

params.claimRewards: true to claim rewards when exit

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: Initializer  First reward MUST be the PRNT token or things will break  related to the 50% penalty and distribution to locked balances.

params.rewardsDuration_: Duration that rewards are streamed over

returns.lockData: which is an array of locks

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rewardPerToken(address).details: Reward is distributed only for locks.

params.slippage: the maximum amount of slippage that the user will incur for each compounding trade
params.status: true if auto compounding is enabled.
true if auto relock is enabled.

stake(uint256,address,uint256).details: Locked tokens cannot be withdrawn for defaultLockDuration and are eligible to receive rewards.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

vestTokens(address,uint256,bool).details: Minted tokens receive rewards normally but incur a 50% penalty when  withdrawn before vestDuration has passed.

withdraw(uint256).details: First withdraws unlocked tokens, then earned tokens. Withdrawing earned tokens  incurs a 50% penalty which is distributed based on locked balances.

Recovered(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when ERC20 token is recovered

addReward(address).notice: Add a new reward token to be distributed to stakers.

claimableRewards(address).notice: Address and claimable amount of all reward tokens for the given account.

defaultLockDuration().notice: Duration of lock/earned penalty period, used for earnings

earnedBalances(address).notice: Earnings which are vesting, and earnings which have vested for full duration.

exit(bool).notice: Withdraw full unlocked balance and earnings, optionally claim pending rewards.

getBalances(address).notice: Total balance of an account, including unlocked, locked and earned tokens.

individualEarlyExit(bool,uint256).notice: Withdraw individual unlocked balance and earnings, optionally claim pending rewards.

lastClaimTime(address).notice: Last claim time of the user

lockInfo(address).notice: Returns all locks of a user.

lockedBalance(address).notice: Reward locked amount of the user.

middleFeeDistribution().notice: Address of Middle Fee Distribution Contract

mintersAreSet().notice: Flag to prevent more minter addings

recoverERC20(address,uint256).notice: Added to support recovering LP Rewards from other systems such as BAL to be distributed to holders.

rewards(address,address).notice: user -> reward token -> amount; used to store reward amount

rewardsDuration().notice: Duration that rewards are streamed over

setAutocompound(bool,uint256).notice: Sets option if auto compound is enabled.

setDefaultRelockTypeIndex(uint256).notice: Set default lock type index for user relock.

setLockTypeInfo(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Sets lock period and reward multipliers.

totalBalance(address).notice: Total balance of an account, including unlocked, locked and earned tokens.

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address,address).notice: user -> reward token -> rpt; RPT for paid amount

userSlippage(address).notice: Maximum slippage for each trade excepted by the individual user when performing compound trades

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw tokens from earnings and unlocked.

withdrawableBalance(address).notice: Final balance received and penalty balance paid by user upon calling exit.

zapVestingToLp(address).notice: Zap vesting PRNT tokens to LP
